description: Warm up on chilly winter mornings with this creamy almond, vanilla and cinnamon porridge. Top with stewed honey-cinnamon apples for some extra warmth.
keywords: Creamy Porridge with Honey & Cinnamon Apples
name: Creamy Porridge with Honey & Cinnamon Apples Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2.5 pkts Carman's Protein Rich Almond, Vanilla & Cinnamon Porridge

recipeInstructions.text: Divide porridge among serving bowls. Top with apple mixture. Serve immediately.
